Package ru.soloviev.domain.models

Class DepositInformation

java.lang.Object
ru.soloviev.domain.models.DepositInformation
public class DepositInformation extends Object
Contains duration of unsafety status of deposit accounts and parts of deposit rate - intervals of amount of money and percents for them

  • Constructor Details

    • DepositInformation

      public DepositInformation(List<DepositInformationPart> parts, Duration span) throws RateException
      Constructor for deposit rate
      Parameters:
      parts - intervals of amount of money and percents for them, first should start by 0, last end by -1, next interval should start with number that equals to end of previous interval
      span - duration of unsafety status of deposit accounts
      Throws:
      RateException - if duration is negative number or parts of deposit rate are incorrect

  • Method Details

    • getSpan

      public static Duration getSpan()
      Getter for duration of unsafety status of deposit accounts
      Returns:
      duration of unsafety status of deposit accounts

    • Percent

      public static BigDecimal Percent(BigDecimal balance) throws RateException
      Find percent for amount of money
      Parameters:
      balance - amount of money
      Returns:
      percent in interval which contains amount of money
      Throws:
      RateException - if input was negative

    • Show

      public String Show()
      Show full information about deposit rate
      Returns:
      string that contains all information about duration and deposit rate parts
